alert.note: Alert for Northern Blue Mountains of Oregon (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 10 at 7:19PM PDT by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Umatilla County through 745 PM PDT... At 719 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over northwestern Umatilla Reservation, or 11 miles east of Pendleton, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Athena, Weston, Adams, Thorn Hollow, Cayuse, Umatilla Reservation and Gibbon. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
